data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: There aren't many people that I get along with, but Janet is different. She a__ I ha__ been han____ out f__ months, and w_ are beco____ good fri____. She i_ quiet, but s__ really lis____ to wh__ I s__. It's always nice to have a conversation with her.
data.fullContent: There aren't many people that I get along with, but Janet is different. She and I have been hanging out for months, and we are becoming good friends. She is quiet, but she really listens to what I say. It's always nice to have a conversation with her.
data.answer: 和我相处的人不多，但珍妮特不一样。她和我在一起好几个月了，我们已经成为好朋友了。她很安静，但她真的能听我说话。和她谈话总是很愉快。
